title: Filling Investor Needs with Sheryl Mejia of Steward Asset Management

media:group.media:title: Filling Investor Needs with Sheryl Mejia of Steward Asset Management
media:group.media:description:
Fund Flow: Emerging Managers Podcast - Episode 7: September 15, 2022
On this episode, Steward Asset Management's managing partner Sheryl Mejia joins host Jon Finger to discuss what spurred the creation of her own firm and why maintaining empathy for founders is key. Sheryl shares her advice for emerging managers raising their first fund and GPs who have recently closed their first committed fund. She also shares why emerging managers need to understand what need they are filling for the investor and why learning to balance leadership is vital to long-term success.

Transcript & Summary: https://media.mcguirewoods.com/events/2022/Fund-Flow-Ep6.pdf

Show info: https://www.mcguirewoods.com/fund-flow
